title: Monitoring cell-surface expression of GPCR by ELISA
title_html: Monitoring cell-surface expression of GPCR by ELISA

source.description: Coat 24-well plates with Poly-L-Lysine (this need to be done in a biological safety cabinet to ensure sterility).

Add
of
Poly-L-Lysine solution in each well of the 24-well plate and incubate
at
.
This can be done using a 300µL multichannel pipet fitted with 4 tips

Remove the Poly-L-Lysine solution (this solution can be re-used up to 4 times to coat cell culture plasticware).
This can be done using a 300µL multichannel pipet fitted with 4 tips

Rinse the wells twice with
of sterile water.

Let dry the 24-well plate without lid under the biological safety cabinet for
before seeding cells.

source.body: Poly-L-Lysine-coated plates can be stored for several weeks at befor use.

source.description:
Prepare transfections of plasmids encoding HA tagged-GPCRs (this need to be done in a biological safety cabinet to ensure sterility).
For 3 well of the 24-well plate:

source.body: In the case you want to compare expression of a mutant receptor, positive and negative controls are needed to normalize the results. The positive control should be the wild-type receptor and the negative control should be cells transfected with the empy vector (MOCK cells).

source.description:
Add
of Opti-MEM into a sterile 5mL tube.
Prepare HEK293 cells for transfection (this need to be done in a biological safety cabinet to ensure sterility).

source.body: Ideally, cells were seeded at a density of 3 million cells per 10cm-pretri dish 48h before transfection to ensure a high transfection rate.

source.description:
Add
of plasmidic DNA encoding for the desired HA tagged-GPCR to the tube containing Opti-MEM and mix.

Add
of P3000 Reagent to the tube and mix.

Add
of Lipofectamine 3000 to the tube, mix, and incubate at
for
.
Remove culture media and rinse cells with PBS.

Add
of 0.25% Trypsin to a 10-cm petri dish and incubate for
at
.

Add
of complete DMEM (10% FBS, 20mM HEPES, Penicilin/Streptomycin) to the petri dish and dissociate cells by pipeting up and down.
Count cells using an automated cell counter or a hemacytometer.
Adjust cell concentration to 150,000 cells/mL.

Add
of the cell suspension at 150,000 cells/mL to the 5mL tube containing the plasmidic DNA and mix gently.

Dispense
of the mix of cell and plasmidic DNA to the desired wells of the Poly-L-Lysine-coated 24-well
plate.

Incubate at
for
.
Detection of cell surface expression by ELISA (this part of the protocol can be done on the wet bench).

source.body: Buffer and reagents in this part of the protocol can be dispensed to the 24-well plate using combitips and a single channel repeater.

source.description:
Remove cell culture media and wash each well with
of PBS.

Fix cells using
of
formaldehyde in TBS for
at
.

Rinse cells three times with
of TBS.

Block non-specific sites using
of
non-fat dry milk disolved in TBS for
under gentle orbital agitation.

source.body: In case non-fat dry milk is not suitable for blocking non-specific sites, a solution of of Bovine Serum Albumine in TBS can be used. The same solution must also be used for the incubation of the antibody.

source.description:
Remove blocking solution and add
of 1/1000 dilution of HRP-linked anti-HA antiboby diluted in
non-fat dry milk in TBS for
under gentle orbital agitation.

source.body: This incubation step can also be done at under gentle orbital agitation.

source.description:
Remove antibody solution and wash each well three times with
of TBS.

Add
of
3, 3′,5 ,5′-Tetramethylbenzidine (TMB) Liquid Substrate, Supersensitive, for ELISA and incubate under gentle orbital agitation for 2 to 15 min (until the color of your positive control turn intense blue).

Stop the TMB reaction by adding
of
Hydroclhoric Acid (HCl).

Transfer
of the colorimetric reaction to a flat-bottom transparent 96-well plate.
Read the absorbance at 450nm using a multimode plate reader.

As this quantification of cell surface expression is a semi-quantitative method it should not be presented as raw OD450nm values but rather as a percentage of expression compared to the positive control (or wild-type receptor).
To normalize the results, average the OD450nm of the positive control and the OD450nm of the negative control and apply the following formula:

materials.name: NESTLE CARNATION Instant Non-fat Dry Milk
Falcon® 24-Well Flat-Bottom Plate, Tissue Culture-Treated 50 Plates
FBS (Fetal Bovine Serum) Premium Quality   Endotoxin <1 Hemoglobin <25
DMEM 4.5g/L glucose with L-glutamine sodium pyruvate and phenol red
Penicillin (5000IU) / Streptomycin (5000μg/mL) sterile filtered for cell culture

description: Quantifying cell surface expression of G Protein-Coupled Receptors (GPCRs) can be exteremly important for the expression of mutant receptors. Herein we report a useful Enzyme-Linked Immunosorbent Assay (ELISA) for the cell-surface detection of a HA-tagged version of a GPCR.
